name: Hitler Waifu
description:
Welcome to the absurd world of Hitler Waifu! In this satirical video game, you take on the unconventional character of Eva, Adolf Hitler's wife. As a secret agent of the Nazi regime, your mission is to take over the city and dismantle the infamous and dangerous machine known as "CUMunism". With a whimsical mix of humor and satire, navigate outlandish scenarios and face bizarre enemies determined to stop you. Stay ahead of the curve as you embark on this comedic journey that defies historical norms and pokes fun at the absurdities of power and ideology. Will you succeed in your mission or will fun follow? Remember that this game is purely fictional and aims to take a satirical look at historical events in a lighthearted and entertaining manner. Get ready to rewrite history in the most unexpected way with Hitler Waifu!

Hitler Waifu - a satirical third-person shooter with elements of black humor, where you play as the wife of Adolf Hitler, having received a task from him, you, like a real special agent, go to capture the city, where you will be stopped by communist soldiers and other opponents, use the legendary tank to punch your way and detonate communist explosives to destroy the obstacle. Also in the game, everyone is waiting for funny Easter eggs and just laughter!

Features of the game:
  • Dangerous communists who want to stop you
  • Beautiful costume personally from the beloved husband of the Fuhrer
  • Research the map for humor and references
  • Communist experiment ready to destroy you
  • The scariest car "CUMunism"
  • A chance to play as the cutest wife of the Fuhrer and prove your love to him!
